# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

add_executable(nbd-test)


target_link_libraries(nbd-test PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  tools-enum_parser-enum_serialization_runtime
  blockstore-libs-common
  blockstore-libs-diagnostics
  blockstore-libs-nbd
  blockstore-libs-service
  core-libs-common
  core-libs-coroutine
  core-libs-diagnostics
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-deprecated-atomic
)

target_allocator(nbd-test
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(nbd-test PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(nbd-test PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/app.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/initiator.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/main.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/options.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/runnable.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/target.cpp
)


generate_enum_serilization(nbd-test
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/options.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  cloud/blockstore/tools/testing/nbd-test/options.h
)

vcs_info(nbd-test)
